key.name: show-panel-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to show the main panel for the focused window. Empty array means disabled (default).

key.name: hide-panel-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to hide the main panel. Default is Escape key.

key.name: open-preferences-shortcut
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to open preferences while main panel is visible. Default is Ctrl+Comma.

key.name: active-space-collection-id
key.description: The ID of the currently active SpaceCollection. Empty string means use the first available preset.

key.name: license-key
key.description: User's license key for subscription access.

key.name: license-activation-id
key.description: Device activation ID returned from the backend API.

key.name: license-valid-until
key.description: Cached license validation expiry timestamp (Unix timestamp in seconds).

key.name: license-last-validated
key.description: Timestamp of last successful license validation (Unix timestamp in seconds).

key.name: trial-days-used
key.description: Number of days the extension has been used during trial period (0-30).

key.name: trial-last-used-date
key.description: Last date the extension was used in trial mode (ISO 8601 format, e.g., "2026-01-31").
